article: I joined class five at the South Eastern Railway Mixed Higher Secondary School in Kharagpur, West Bengal. As the _ girl in class, it took a while to make friends, but I found a kindred spirit right away: my class teacher, Miss Rafique, who also taught English. The first assignment she gave the class was to write a letter to a friend about any recent _ . I'd never written a letter before but I used my _ and wrote in great detail about my visit to Delhi, a place I had _ been to. I wrote about all its tourist spots, which included a _ When Miss Rafique returned our assignments to us, she made a(n) 28 _ in front of our class of 60 girls and boys. "Annapurna has written the best letter," she said. I stood _ by Miss Rafique's desk as she read out my letter to the class _ handing my notebook to me. Reaching my seat, I opened my notebook and was _ to see many red marks--all spelling and grammatical _ . I thought a best letter would be one with no mistakes. There were also two little 33 _ in the margins . "Delhi doesn't have a beach," and "Very good !" When I looked at a _ notebook, her letter was error-free. Later, I realized that my classmates had memorized and reproduced sample letters from High School English Grammar & Composition by Wren and Martin. In spite of the mistakes, it was my originality that Miss Rafique actually 35 _ . Soon, my teacher made me realize that math and science weren't my only _ subjects; I could do well in English too. Thanks to her timely _ , I now write articles on nutrition for magazines and I enjoy my job.
